initial_warning.title: A mysterious old man approaches...
initial_warning.message:
"Beware the nights of Candledark! In three days time, the spirits will rise wreak havoc for the living.

Pumpkin wards will protect you. Ask your Carpenter about them."

candledark_eve.title: Candledark Eve is here!
candledark_eve.message: And....nothing. Crazy old man and his superstitious ramblings...
